title: About Me
text:
My career aspiration is to build a successful business within the food and beverage industry. I am passionate about creating innovative concepts that bring people together through food, and I strive to contribute to the industry with a fresh perspective and entrepreneurial spirit.




Multilingual: Ability to communicate in multiple languages, which helps bridge cultural gaps and expand business opportunities.
Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills, effective in both team settings and customer interactions.
Teamwork: Collaborative and cooperative, with a proven ability to work effectively in group environments.
Adaptability: Quick to adjust to new environments and challenges, always eager to learn and grow.




I am currently a senior at California State Polytechnic University, Pomona, pursuing my Business Management and Marketing undergraduate degree. My studies have provided me with a strong foundation in business principles, critical thinking, and hands-on experience that supports my long-term goals in the food and beverage industry.
Thanks for checking out my web site!
